title: Python - A Language For Everyone
summary: Python is designed so that you don’t have to think about the rules and syntax of the language as you write your code. Python’s open-source nature made the language completely free to use. Python is currently the second most popular programming language (after the ever-present JavaScript), with a vast community of developers, tools, tutorials, and resources. Python offers a wide range of data types, including strings, numbers, lists, and dictionaries. Python also offers a whole host of services, including the ability to use various programming paradigms, and the ability. to use modules and packages.
